allow:
Bash(powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "
Write-Host ''Initiating reboot in 10 seconds...''
Start-Sleep -Seconds 10
Restart-Computer -Force
")
Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command "Get-Service YoloWrapAPI -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object Name, Status, StartType")
